One specific post claimed that black peo: s melanin provides defense against the novel coronavirus and was shared over 2,000 times on Facebook in South Africa.

However, an expert from the Institut Pasteur in Dakar, Senegal, stated that there is no scientific evidence to support the claim, emphasizing that ethnicity and genetics do not influence recovery from the virus and that black people do not have more antibodies than white people.
